sys_script_include.description: This Script include (made by Lucas L.) says hi to a user by 1) Receiving which table to user's info is from, and 2) Knowing which row is the user's by receiving the user's ID.
sys_script_include.name: GetNameOfUser

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cac5b03e475e4210b0c2cbb9316d4335
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetNameOfUser</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This Script include (made by Lucas L.) says hi to a user by 1) Receiving which table to user's info is from, and 2) Knowing which row is the user's by receiving the user's ID.</description><name>GetNameOfUser</name><script><![CDATA[var GetNameOfUser = Class.create();
GetNameOfUser.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getName: function()
	{
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		return userRecord.name + '';
	},

    type: 'GetNameOfUser'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-24 17:59:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>cac5b03e475e4210b0c2cbb9316d4335</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetNameOfUser</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cac5b03e475e4210b0c2cbb9316d4335</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-24 20:47:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
